ModMetaData.name: Star Wars Races
ModMetaData.author: Foggy Morning
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the Wookie, Rodian and Twi'lek races. Adds all three races to the PlayerColony and PlayerTribe factions. Does not add any additional factions. Includes new hats for Twi'leks only. Adds a Wookie bandolier as well. See the attached images. Should be compatible with other existing Star Wars mods that use the PlayerColony and PlayerTribe factions.
Update 2/23/2019 Now includes an options menu that lets you change the chance for the individual species to show up in game.
Update 3/2/2019 Adds Ewok species: includes ewok hook and parka/tabard Ewoks have a new body type "Oval" Makes wookies slightly thicker Fixed a few other bugs. Twi'leks can now use power armor and belts and should be able to use mod clothing that doesn't use the overhead layer. Wookie Bandolier now correctly uses wookie apparel research Wookie leather is no longer blue. Now wookies and ewoks use 'humanlike leather'
